duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the development of improved product transfer processes and ensure effective commercialization of products.
Act as the primary interface between Manufacturing and the sending organization to drive effective communication and expedient execution at all stages of the project.
Work closely with all stakeholders in strategic planning to ensure that project activities are progressing according to established timeline.
Minimize potential for issues or impact of issues during the manufacturing process transfer.
Provide suggestions and guidance to ensure commercial viability, efficiency, and quality are considered in process design.
Collaborate with Validation group to transfer knowledge from Technical Transfer batches and ensure a successful validation campaign.
Write campaign summary reports and develop commercial records in collaboration with process scientists.
Analyze data from Technical Transfer batches and make recommendations for establishing a commercial process.
Provide leadership for technical transfer procedure, ensure projects adhere to the tech transfer procedure, and make process improvements as needed.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of Bachelor’s degree in science or engineering with at least 10 years of experience. Master’s degree in science or engineering with at least 5 years of experience. Doctorate degree in science or engineering with at least 2 years of experience.
